teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142

teams.name: TEKenable
teams.description: TEKenable is an international software development company that provides software development consultancy, support and cloud computing solutions to organisations of all sizes in the public and private sector.

teams.name: HELP Yourself
teams.loan_because: Improving ones future should be in your own hands.
teams.description: People that want to help others help themselves.  The pride that comes in doing for yourself is what helps a person move forward.

teams.name: Scotland
teams.loan_because: Scotland has always been a place where inventors have prospered and philanthropy has flourished. This is a chance to show that Scots do care and can make a difference in the world.
teams.description: It's a team for anyone who has links to Scotland, either through birth, marriage or simply location.

teams.name: Alegría Capital
teams.description: Alegría is a mood, a state of mind.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising

teams.name: User Experience / Interaction / Human Factors Designers
teams.loan_because:
We believe in finding a good and best "fit" for people's lives as Human Factors/Usability Professionals everyday.

This extends to why we are micro-lenders because we believe this is one of the ways that closes that gap between the need for capital investments and Kiva micro-entrepreneurs' ambitions to thrive in their business and reap the benefits for themselves and their immediate family.
teams.description:
We are a group devotedly interested in people, their motivations, their desires, their emotions, their capabilities and oftentimes, their limitations.  In other words: we are interested in all things human nature as it reflects in products, services and beyond.

Kiva is one of those services that we like.

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: PraiseCharts Worship Leaders
teams.loan_because: This is what life is about. Helping and serving others.
teams.description: We are the worship leaders of the world, not because we stand on a stage, but because we love and serve people.

teams.name: Late Loaning Lenders
teams.loan_because:
We hate to see loans being left unfunded on 
Kiva. Although most of these loans are 
pre-funded by the Field Partners, the Field
Partners lose out on the capital if a loan
doesn't get funded on Kiva. We believe that 
this will damage the Field Partners in the long 
term and impair their capacity to make loans to new borrowers.

We can't save every red loan, but we try to
make a difference as in the Starfish Story:
http://www.ordinarypeoplechangetheworld.com/articles/the-starfish-story.aspx

Help us fund loans we're already supporting:
http://www.kiva.org/team/late_loaning_lenders/loans?status=fundRaising

We invite you to join us and make a difference, too. Please check the team board at 2 am Kiva time, 7 am Kiva time, 1 pm Kiva time and 6 pm Kiva time to coordinate lending.

See our team fund page:
http://www.kiva.org/lender/kivalllfund
teams.description:
Alan's account of the founding of LLL is on the  team board @Alan re: #260143. Loans that are nearing expiry won't get funded if they don't get noticed. We look for loans that are about to expire by using the Sort By:
"Expiring Soon" option instead of the default "Popularity", and then work to get them funded.

See our team FAQ, linked below (the "check out" link).

A Team LLL glossary (contributed by team member Tony):

Red Loans: Loans that have less than five days to be funded, identifiable by the red box 
with the notice that says "Only x days left!" or 
"Only x hours and y minutes left!"

LLL - Late Loaning Lenders: this team, where 
lenders work together to keep loans from 
expiring.

SFDD - Starfish Daily Dozen: Under current 
practice, one of these lists is prepared and 
posted for each day, to help LLL lenders focus 
and coordinate their lending on a targeted 
group of loans (the Starfish or SF). The lists 
are prepared by a group of volunteers who 
seek to be objective in selecting the loans to 
be included in their lists. They also seek to 
spread out the loans in each list over a 24 hour 
period and to share the joy among the Field 
Partners with loans expiring during that period, 
but their efforts are always constrained by the 
choice of loans that are available for inclusion 
in the list. Loans with larger amounts needed 
will be included in the period immediately after 
each Credit Day, when lenders are feeling 
flush, but the lists will become less ambitious 
when the LLL lenders are feeling poor.

GG - Gorgeous Group: The SFDD list-makers have the option of adding one or two of these 
loans after their SFDD lists. As the name 
implies, only group loans are picked. When it is 
first posted, a typical GG loan will expire two 
days or more after the list is posted. It will 
usually be retained as a GG until it becomes 
Fully Funded or moves into Starfish range. The amount needed when the loan is selected as a GG will vary depending on the time of month.

RTR - Reduce the Red: These lists are 
prepared and posted when there are large 
numbers of loans slated to expire in a short 
period of time, typically at the end of a calen-
dar month. "Red" is a reference to the red 
boxes that are added to a loan description 
when the Loan is about to expire without full 
funding.

Bulge: A short period in which a great many 
loans have their scheduled funding expiration 
times. Bulges come about primarily when a 
Field Partner (FP) submits an amount of loans 
to Kiva during a given month than is greater 
than the FP's quota for that month. The loan 
descriptions are prepared for posting by 
translating the loan descriptions (if necessary) 
and editing them, and they are then held to be posted at the beginning of the following month. Bulge loans are prize candidates for inclusion 
in Reduce the Red lists.

FF - Fully Funded: This is LLL code for a loan 
that has received all the loans required for it to be removed from the list of loans that are 
fundraising and to move into repaying status.

Lars Ratio: the average funding per hour that is needed for a loan to become fully funded.
(Developed by team member Lars)
See a ratio list of current red loans:   http://kivany.vijayr.net/expiring_loans.php 

kivalive.com (older version)
www.kivalive.com/index2.php

Lists are posted on the LLL Team message 
board. Join us!

teams.name: Czech Team
teams.loan_because: People around the world helped us in the past, so we should repay.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27)

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
www.gerv.net/info/christian-field-partners
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Concordia International School Shanghai
teams.description: We are a  Christ-centered community of teachers and learners in Shanghai, China.

teams.name: Team Solis
teams.loan_because: For the first time in human history we can reach out across the world one person to another and eliminate poverty.
teams.description: We live in Southern California. Always active in our communities and extending a hand where possible.

teams.name: New York
teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.
teams.description:
We are a group of like minded New Yorkers who connect to make a difference.

Please note, Team Message unrelated to Kiva New York team lending & activities may be deleted.  Please keep posts related to the team!

http://gplus.to/kivany
